blogs.title: My First Post
blogs.author: Cherle
blogs.body: JSON is an open standard file format and data interchange format that uses human-readable text to store and transmit data objects consisting of attribute value pairs and arrays. It is a common data format with diverse uses in electronic data interchange, including that of web applications with servers.JSON is an open standard file format and data interchange format that uses human-readable text to store and transmit data objects consisting of attribute value pairs and arrays. blogs.title: Font-End Development
blogs.author: carlo
blogs.body: A Front-End Developer is someone who creates websites and web applications. The Front-End Developer creates things that the user sees.
